bibl.title: Nekotorye problemy i osobennosti sozdanija 3D-rekonstrukcij pozdnih rimskih krepostej v Egipte. [Some Problems and Pequliarities (sic, lire: Peculiarities) of the 3D-Reconstruction of the Late Roman Fortresses in Egypt.]
bibl.note: Study the architectural features of late Roman fortresses in Egypt and discuss several problems concerning their peculiarities. The preservation of Roman fortresses in Egypt in whole is worse than in the other provinces of the Empire. The best way to imagine how they could look is to carefully examine the ruins, to compare them with the better preserved fortresses in the other parts of the Roman world and to make their 3D reconstructions. - Avec résumés en russe et en anglais.
bibl.seg: Dmitry Karelin, Tatiana Zhitpeleva & Maria Karelina, Nekotorye problemy i osobennosti sozdanija 3D-rekonstrukcij pozdnih rimskih krepostej v Egipte. [Some Problems and Pequliarities (sic, lire: Peculiarities) of the 3D-Reconstruction of the Late Roman Fortresses in Egypt.]
Architecture and Modern Information Technologies 32 (2015) 22 pp., 10 figg. n./bl. et coul.

Study the architectural features of late Roman fortresses in Egypt and discuss several problems concerning their peculiarities. The preservation of Roman fortresses in Egypt in whole is worse than in the other provinces of the Empire. The best way to imagine how they could look is to carefully examine the ruins, to compare them with the better preserved fortresses in the other parts of the Roman world and to make their 3D reconstructions. - Avec résumés en russe et en anglais.
